name: kiwi-bundle-cli
description: Automate your JS projects with one unique customizable CLI
author: Nazim Lachter <nazim@blueforest.fr>

scripts.start: mkdir -p dist && touch dist/index.js && chmod +x dist/index.js && NODE_ENV=dev tsc -w -p .
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && NODE_ENV=prod tsc -p . && chmod +x dist/index.js
